faq.title: PApp Frequently Asked Questions & Tips and Tricks

section.title: Common Mistakes

qa.q: My application is written in language XYZ, but this language is not shown in the language_selector!

section.qa: All languages used in the source must be declared somewhere. If you use lang="*" then you must declare all possible source languages using the <language> element.

qa.q: I try to access %A/%S, a database etc. in a callback, but it does not work.

section.qa: The callback handlers are executed during a very delicate time, before the actual page gets executed. %S etc. are meaningless during this time. If you want to access something you should take a reference to it and pass it to your callback when you refer() to the callback.

How do I include a filename in a surl (e.g. for a nice Save As preset)

section.qa: Use the GET surlstyle together with SURL_SUFFIX, e.g: surl "download", SURL_STYLE_GET, SURL_SUFFIX, "doc.ps";

section.title: Unexplainable Errors

qa.q: I get an error like "self is not of type PApp::I18n::Table" while my application gets compiled. What gives?

section.qa: You are calling __ or gettext in your module initialization code. This is too early since there is no user and thus no selected language at that point.
